mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Savage, James, 1784-1873
mdRecord.dcterms:description: In book he is writing, intends ascribing an opinion to Jefferson; concerns Gov. Winthrop's History, P. 148, of errors of Mrs. Hutchinson in 1637; asks for correct version of Jefferson's remark on "doctrine of the resurrection" and Roger Williams; asks for answer by Prof. Ticknor.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Winthrop, John, 1588-1649
Hutchinson, Anne, 1591-1643
Williams, Roger, 1604?-1683
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1824 December 1, Boston, [Massachusetts] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
